title: Studies in Performance—Winter Production
description: The in-depth study for a fully staged winter dance production directed and choreographed by faculty and/or guest artists in collaboration with student performers. Admission by audition only. May be taken for credit up to six times for a maximum of twelve units. Prerequisites: audition, department approval, concurrent enrollment in TDMV 110 or TDMV 111 or TDMV 112 or TDMV 120 or TDMV 122 or TDMV 130 or TDMV 133.
